entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
